formattedAddress: 328 E 61st St Ground Floor, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 328 E 61st St Ground Floor, New York, NY 10065-8766, USA

originalText.text: I've trained in martial arts on and off the past twenty years and Range is the most professional, welcoming and optimal gym I've been associated with. You'll get technical training, in depth coaching and great sparring in a fun and safe environment. Over the last year, I've learned a tremendous amount and encourage everyone to come try it.

text.text: I've trained in martial arts on and off the past twenty years and Range is the most professional, welcoming and optimal gym I've been associated with. You'll get technical training, in depth coaching and great sparring in a fun and safe environment. Over the last year, I've learned a tremendous amount and encourage everyone to come try it.

originalText.text:
Every neighborhood in NYC has its own vibe and Midtown East is no exception.  It’s busy but exceptionally clean, it’s trendy but not gauche and although relatively quiet; it’s devastatingly powerful.  Range Jiu-Jitsu is a perfect complement for this part of town.

The first American to receive a Brown belt in Jiu-Jitsu was President Theodore Roosevelt who lived about a mile down the road. We can only imagine that he would’ve been completely over the moon to have a Jiu-Jitsu school right here in his old neighborhood.

History aside, Range Jiu-Jitsu is a great place to learn the gentle art whether you want to be a competitor, a hobbyist or just want to stay fit.

Eduardo, the head instructor is one of the greatest ambassadors BJJ has to offer.  You’re always greeted with a warm smile, a firm handshake and he never forgets your name.  His skill level is amongst the elite, he teaches with meticulous detail that can simplify even some of the more complex moves. He also works in his marvelous sense of humor that makes this journey all the more fun.

At 57, I started my Journey a little later in the game so my first concern of course was for my safety as in, how would a senior adult fit in working out with a school of much younger and fit students?    You will find a very friendly vibe at Range, especially to newcomers.  But the truest test of a professor is in his students.  Range students are quiet professionals who check their egos along with their shoes at the front door.

BJJ is not easy. You will learn to adapt to being physically and mentally challenged; awkward, out of breath and overpowered, sometimes by smaller and weaker training partners.  But you will never be abused or humiliated.  People here respect your boundaries and move at your own pace.

I highly recommend Range BJJ as it checks all the right boxes.  It’s on the ground floor, easily accessible and immaculately clean.  On the mat, there is a serious yet fun vibe.  The best way to learn anything is to have fun while you’re doing it!

originalText.text: Eduardo runs an amazing program. Being new to the sport, I was able to transition into the program easily and safely. BJJ is not easy, but Eduardo and every other instructor make sure you understand what is going on so that you learn in the most efficient way. Highly recommend.

text.text: Eduardo runs an amazing program. Being new to the sport, I was able to transition into the program easily and safely. BJJ is not easy, but Eduardo and every other instructor make sure you understand what is going on so that you learn in the most efficient way. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Range BJJ is an outstanding gym. The place is very clean and well kept, and Professor Eduardo is one of the best instructors I ever met. As someone who already tried other big gyms in the city, I was truly impressed with the level of personalized attention he gives to each of his students. Look no further for a place to train whether you're a complete beginner or a more advanced student.

text.text: Range BJJ is an outstanding gym. The place is very clean and well kept, and Professor Eduardo is one of the best instructors I ever met. As someone who already tried other big gyms in the city, I was truly impressed with the level of personalized attention he gives to each of his students. Look no further for a place to train whether you're a complete beginner or a more advanced student.

originalText.text: Eduardo is an incredible teacher and makes the sessions so enjoyable. The gym is great and also has great gear. 10/10 gym.
